alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phillips County through 1030 PM CDT... At 957 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Long Island to 6 miles southeast of Prairie View to near Logan. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Phillipsburg and Woodruff around 1005 PM CDT. Glade and Speed around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Agra and Kirwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
